Authors:
Mark S. Hafner, James W. Demastes, Theresa A.
Spradling
Title:
The effects of spatial and temporal scale on analyses of
cophylogeny.
Abstract:
Pocket gopher and chewing louse mitochondrial cytochrome
oxidase I DNA-sequences are compared. Data include gophers and lice from
Hafner et al., 1994, Science (265:1087-1090) and a new set of gopher
(Thomomys) and louse (Geomydoecus and Thomomydoecus) sequences.
